La Cenerentola, ossia La bont in trionfo (Cinderella, or Goodness Triumphant) 
is an operatic dramma giocoso in two acts by Gioachino Rossini. The libretto was 
written by Jacopo Ferretti, based on the fairy tale Cendrillon by Charles Perrault. 
The opera was first performed in Rome's Teatro Valle on 25 January 1817. ...
